title: didnt get lux icon from taking star guardian survey
body: said to wait 2-3 days, its been 5! dont mind waiting just wanna make sure my account gets it :)

replies.body: It can take up to 72 hours for the icon to unlock, but it may take longer.  Some players may receive theirs soon than others., but you'll be fine as long as you took the quiz while logged into the site.  Just hang tight, and the goodies will come!
Hello, it's been two weeks and I still haven't received the icon, is there a way to resolve this, it's the best looking in my opinion, and I really would like it, thanks!

Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can help out with that!  We can look into this for you as well as try and figure out why you haven't received it.  We'll respond asap!
Oh, thank you very much for your reply, I will do so now!
its been about 5 days for me still nothing
